entry.title: Is forEach a loop in JavaScript?

link.title: Is forEach a loop in JavaScript?

entry.summary: This question has confused many of us for a long time, is it a loop? or is it a function? A for loop repeats until a specified condition evaluates to false, it is similar to the Java and C for loo...
